title: Pemberton teen allegedly killed by friend remembered at vigil
content:
PEMBERTON TOWNSHIP — Friends and loved ones of Davon Coleman poured into a township home's driveway, and into the street Friday evening, determined that the beloved Pemberton High School wrestling star's death would not be in vain.
